name: SEX with HITLER 2
description:
Sex With Hitler is a unique blend of visual novel and top-down shooter.
Fuhrer - is the protagonist of the story, He lost everything and now he’s looking for a new life.
Along with him, you will fight in the fields of World War II and meet unique heroines, among whom you will find both friends and enemies.
Game Features:Brutal Combat: game features a combat that balances brute force and patience waiting for the right moment. Equip yourself with some deadly weapons and kill them all!
Story-Driven Action: dive deep into our girls' personalities & go through the story together with them.
WW2 Inspired Aesthetics: dive in the most epic adventure you could ever imagine. Fight all your enemies and immerse in the story to fully embrace the world!
All characters are over 18 years old
